description.value:
Special: Razor-Sharp, Tearing, Daemon Wep

Note: Base Weapon: Legion Bolter. Daemon Willpower 28 (Minor Warp Entity), Bind Str 2. Attributes: Vicious Weapon Gains Razor-Sharp Quality. Weapon is Heavy if wielded by non-Space Marine, suffer -20 to use if not Unnatural Strength (4+)
